sect1.title: Working with Staging Projects
sect1.para: This API provides an easy way to get information about a single or all staging projects like state, requests and checks. Note: To use this API, you first need to setup a staging workflow for a project.

sect2.title: Overview of All Staging Projects
sect2.para: This endpoint provides an overview of all staging projects for a certain project.
Which will return the following XML:
sect2.screen: <staging_projects> <staging_project name="home:Admin:Staging:A" state="empty"> <staged_requests count="0"/> <untracked_requests count="0"/> <requests_to_review count="0"/> <obsolete_requests count="0"/> <missing_reviews count="0"/> <broken_packages count="0"/> <checks count="0"/> <missing_checks count="0"/> </staging_project> <staging_project name="home:Admin:Staging:B" state="empty"> <staged_requests count="0"/> <untracked_requests count="0"/> <requests_to_review count="0"/> <obsolete_requests count="0"/> <missing_reviews count="0"/> <broken_packages count="0"/> <checks count="0"/> <missing_checks count="0"/> </staging_project> </staging_projects>

sect2.title: Overview of All Staging Projects
sect2.para: This endpoint provides an overview of a single staging project.
Which will return the following XML:
sect2.screen: <staging_project name="home:Admin:Staging:A" state="empty"> <staged_requests count="0"/> <untracked_requests count="0"/> <requests_to_review count="0"/> <obsolete_requests count="0"/> <missing_reviews count="0"/> <broken_packages count="0"/> <checks count="0"/> <missing_checks count="0"/> </staging_project>

sect2.title: Copy a Staging Project
sect2.para: This endpoint creates a copy of a staging project. It will queue a job which is going to copy the project configuration, repositories, groups and users.
